name: Hover Card
description: Hover or long-press triggered popovers for rich previews.

use: you want hover previews with richer content than tooltips.
you need delayed or debounced hover behavior.

examples.minimal:
HoverCard(
  child: const Text('Hover me'),
  hoverBuilder: (context) => const Text('Preview content'),
)

do: Use a small debounce to avoid flicker.
dont: Put required form actions inside a hover card.
